title: Calories in Cheesecake Factory Cheesecake
meta_description: Learn calories in cheesecake factory cheesecake per slice, including carbs, fat, protein, full nutrition breakdown, and preparation tweaks for better choices.
assumptions: Standard slice of Original Cheesecake (~170 g), restaurant serving; no additional toppings unless noted.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, portion size, recipe changes, and customizations. Check Cheesecake Factory's menu or app for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One slice of Cheesecake Factory Original Cheesecake contains about 707 kcal, with high fat and sugar content.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one slice of Cheesecake Factory cheesecake?
faqs.a: Approximately 707 kcal for a standard Original slice.

faqs.q: What are the macros for Cheesecake Factory cheesecake?
faqs.a: Per slice: 71 g carbs, 43 g fat, 10 g protein, with 51 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is Cheesecake Factory cheesecake high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, one slice has about 51 g of sugars, mostly from the filling and crust.

faqs.q: How does Godiva cheesecake compare in calories?
faqs.a: Godiva Chocolate Cheesecake slice is higher at ~920 kcal due to added chocolate.

faqs.q: Can I reduce calories in Cheesecake Factory cheesecake?
faqs.a: Opt for half portions, low-carb options, or share; avoid extra toppings like whipped cream.
